title: Provides for the sale, availability and distribution of healthy foods and beverages as part of a school lunch program
summary: Provides for the sale, availability and distribution of healthy foods and beverages as part of a school lunch program; sets forth portion size and food requirements; requires nutritional information on all food items and beverages which are not prepackaged with such; provides for a ten cent reimbursement from the state per lunch sold; requires the commissioner to establish a procedure for engaging school wellness committees.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing for the sale, availability and distribution of healthy foods and beverages for school lunch programs
